com.aevi.payment

Class PaymentAppConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.BundleWrapper
      • com.aevi.payment.PaymentAppConfiguration

  • public class PaymentAppConfiguration
extends BundleWrapper
    Returned by the payment application following a startActivityForResult using the PaymentAppConfigurationRequest. It can be obtained in the onActivityResult handler using the fromIntent(Intent) method. 

     
 protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data) {
   // Get transaction result
   PaymentAppConfiguration result = PaymentAppConfiguration.fromIntent(data);
 }
    See Also:
    PaymentAppConfigurationRequest

      • getDefaultCurrency

        public java.util.Currency getDefaultCurrency()
        Gets the default currency of the payment application. Null is returned when the payment application has no default currency.
        Returns:
        default currency of the payment application or null if the payment application has no default currency.

      • fromIntent

        public static PaymentAppConfiguration fromIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
                                          throws AeviRequestDataMissingException
        Obtains a PaymentAppConfiguration from an intent. If the intent is null or does not contain a transaction result, a AeviRequestDataMissingException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        intent - Intent to get the payment configuration from.
        Returns:
        the PaymentAppConfiguration instance that was attached to the intent.
        Throws:
        AeviRequestDataMissingException

      • getPaymentApplicationStatus

        public static ServiceState getPaymentApplicationStatus(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the status of the payment application or simulator. The caller must request the {Permissions.Configuration} permission for this call to execute.
        Parameters:
        context - Android Context object
        Returns:
        {ServiceState} of the Payment application or simulator.

      • isPaymentApplicationInstalled

        public static boolean isPaymentApplicationInstalled(android.content.Context context)
        Detects whether or not the payment application (or simulator) is installed
        Parameters:
        context - Android Context object
        Returns:
        true if the payment application or simulator is installed

        public boolean isPaymentApiUsable()
        Indicates if the provider API is usable with the client API for the payment function
        Returns:

      • canPrintCombinedReceipt

        public boolean canPrintCombinedReceipt()
        Returns true if this payment device is able to use extra print data during receipt printing, such as merchant headers etc to print a single combined receipt for further details see print payload methods in AeviRequest
        Returns:
        True if extra print data can be passed in payment requests to this application
